abstract: Late Tuesday the Web giant Amazon.com unveiled Amazon Studios, described as a new online business that invites aspiring screenwriters and filmmakers from around the world to submit scripts and full-length “test” movies. Top submissions, determined by a panel of movie industry experts, will win various cash prizes worth $2.7 million in total.
snippet: Late Tuesday the Web giant Amazon.com unveiled Amazon Studios, described as a new online business that invites aspiring screenwriters and filmmakers from around the world to submit scripts and full-length “test” movies. Top submissions, determined...
lead_paragraph: Amazon.com, having conquered online retail, wants to become a player in Hollywood movie- making?

headline.main: Amazon Puts on Its Sunglasses and Goes Hollywood
